website_summaries.verdict: This patent-pending design lets you use the inflatable fabric arm bands with or without the swim belt.
pros: Design grows with your child and his or her swimming abilities
Use swim belt with inflatable arm bands, or detach and use bands alone
Made of woven polyester and nylon
Recommended for children weighing between 24 and 66 pounds
cons: Sizing is different from other swim vests due to detachable style

customer_reviews.title: Well designed for a big kid.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, but it's huuuuge. I could have sworn that she was within the weight limit before we bought this, too! This product is not meant for your littles, but seems designed more for big kids who need assistance. As for the design of the product, it's clearly a well thought out and constructed item. I wish we could have used it, but we're certain she'll be swimming unassisted long before this will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!! Must have for kids over 50lbs
customer_reviews.text: Our kids are 5 & 7 and we hardly go swimming so they’ve never had to take swim lessons, because of this they needed floaties. I found it so hard to find floaties for their weight (over 50lbs), especially ones that we’re not life vests. These floaties were great!! We used them for the first time last night and though I stayed in arms reach of them, they were able to be free and play! (Which is a first because usually they cling to me for dear life) I’m SOOOOO thankful to have found these!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: We needed something compact and easy to travel with for our summer vacation
customer_reviews.text: We needed something compact and easy to travel with for our summer vacation. We do own the Stearns puddle jumper but those are really bulky and inconvenient for packing into a suitcase. These were the perfect solution and even came with a storage bag too, which is a great value. The detachable belt buckles are really useful too - I'm surprised no one else has thought of that yet. We currently have the arm floaties attached since he's still learning how to swim, but once he's more experienced, we'll detach them so he can just use the arm floaties. Would definitely recommend, especially to take along on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fan

customer_reviews.title: Will do it's job, but sizing is weird.
customer_reviews.text: Returned this floatie. Was looking for something for my small 6yo since she's almost outgrown the arms of her puddle jumper. She's comfortable in water and can sort of swim, but I don't trust her ability in water where she can't touch the bottom when an adult isn't in the pool with her. I'm sure this would have kept her afloat, but the arms were HUGE. Ridiculously large. My daughter said she wouldn't wear it because they were so big (and she wasn't being dramatic). Will move on to regular arm floaties and swim lessons from here.
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: Quality=Meh. Security=Not so Much. Headache=getting warmer
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. My 26 lb daughter not only looked uncomfortable in this, but also was stripped of the comfort of ‘fearlessly floating’ as this device just isn’t well fitting nor is it as well made as its competitors. The arm floats aren’t half bad but the fabric from the chest peice is separate from the foam within. Thus it away and slips, twists, pulls -contouring the angle of the floatation device within, never allowing for a comfortable moment in which I felt she could safely be held by hands or arms alone. THATS no fun in the pool— nor is it a good first time swimmers experience for her, and a headache for me!
customer_reviews.author: Audrea

customer_reviews.title: THIS is what you've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a LONG time looking for something for the grandkids, that wouldn't choke them out as soon as they hit the water. The vest is meant to be straight across the chest, and has a strap across the back so you can tighten it enough to prevent rising. The cutout in the front finishes the job nicely. LOVE that this is separate pieces so they can graduate and use the water wings or not. The colors are awesome. Wish it didn't say "First Floatie", but I got over it in a hurry. :-)
customer_reviews.author: P. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this and replace my son's puddle jumper, and we did for about 25 uses or so. At first it was perfect, worked great for my tall 3 1/2 year old and he definitely had room to grow (which we were hoping for). However, towards the end of the summer, the middle piece broke in half and it will not stay on him like it's supposed to. We were hoping we were going to get at least another year out of it, but I will have to trash it. For the price I expected more use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Maebri

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: These seemed like something my daughter could grow into. They worked perfectly at first but after a couple uses the stitching started to come apart on the arm pieces. We used them until it completely came apart, after maybe 7 hours of swim time. The fit was very loose from the chest part to the arm because of the buckles and the arm pieces kept slipping off and my daughter was always pulling them up when she was out of the water. I do not recommend these and ended up buying a normal puddle jumper 2 weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Starfire

customer_reviews.title: Great item for those learning to swim
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my daughter who is 9 years old. She had been doing well with a life vest but wanted something that could help her learn to swim and have the flexibility to allow her to gain confidence in herself while she learns to swim. This item does just that. She started with all three pieces attached then removed the chest portion so she’s only wearing arm floats. I like how the pieces do not have to remain attached, and it comes with a large enough mesh bag to hold all 3 pieces
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for your big kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 4 year old who has out grown her puddle jumper. I was originally looking for the cloth arm floaties. When I run across these I thought they would be perfect and they are. My daughter loves it and the ease of removing the body float is great. I especially love the extra safety on the latch. We love these.
customer_reviews.author: NanaHE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for 4-5yrs!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my soon to be five-year-old kid (he’s bit on the chunky side, around 45lbs I think). I have purchased other floaty’s in the past that have the front float and the two arm floats and they would barely keep his head above water. This one actually keeps him afloat and he didn’t constantly get water in his mouth. It’s also great for slowly transitioning him off floaty’s because we can remove the front floaty completely. This product is fantastic for a kid who has out grown the toddler floaters but hasn’t quite learned to swim on his own yet!
customer_reviews.author: Master Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set!
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well. What I don't like is that just the chest piece by itself isn't enough to keep the child afloat. The arm pieces were chaffing under my daughter's arms really bad but unfortunately I couldn't take them off because she would sink with just the chest piece. Lesson learned so now I'll just make sure she's wearing a long sleeved rash guard with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel W.

customer_reviews.title: Great floatie for bigger kids
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to find this floatie. My 7 year old, 50 lb daughter had outgrown her puddle jumper but is still learning to swim and this was perfect!! It's more comfortable than the puddle jumper ever was and easier to put on and take off. It would actually fit an even bigger kid, I pull the belt pretty tight on my daughter, there's a lot of room to grow. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo78

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: So I got this in August 2019. It worked good. Fit him and dint hurt him. About a month ago the straps that connected to the arm floaters came off. The strap just ripped off. Then a couple weeks late, part of the back strap ripped off. He was still able to use it. Then the other day the back strap ripped completely off. So now he can not use it. We have had it for a year and it tore apart. I was disappointed because he really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Clint &Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my 4 YO
customer_reviews.text: Even though we could make the vest tight around her middle, it would just slide down her, and the arm buckles were very loose. Too bad! Perhaps it works better for taller or bulkier kids. She is roughly 40 pounds and 39 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Cheap blowup arm pieces
customer_reviews.text: This could have just been too big for my daughter (she is 4.5 years old and 38lbs) but after the arms were inflated (which you have to do yourself with air) she went into the water her arms just went to the bottom of the arm floatie where there was a big gap. She wanted to take it off immediately. We ended up just throwing it away. I thought the arm pieces would have been made of the same lifejacket floating material as the chest piece not some cheap blowup air arm piece.
customer_reviews.author: Doja11

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 38-lb toddler
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this belt-and-floaties setup. Nice design, although I've only had him wear it over a rash guard so far. Packs down pretty small and the included mesh bag is really nice to have. Really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L. E. McCall

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a blue one and a pink one for my twins and the quality is fantastic. Really soft, durable and the mesh bag to keep it all together is great. Definitely agree with other reviews, great for taking it with you and keeping it all together. I especially like the idea of being able to detach the floaties.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: what a great product
customer_reviews.text: My son got a horrible rash from a life vest he was given by the lifeguard on duty. i came home and immediately looked up puddle jumpers for his weight. Doji was the one I chose and though i was a little worried about its sleek design when we finally received it, its actually really great. he loves it. he was soooo confident the last time we were at the pool. I'm so incredibly happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Goodloe

customer_reviews.title: Good seller service
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to try the floatie on my daughter yet but I’m excited to try it. Seller emailed to confirm that the item arrived and made sure item fits my needs. Thanks! Can’t wait to try it on my daughter. Looks exactly as the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to have been made well, but is way too large and on the smallest setting, the chest piece fell down off my girls who are 4 and 6 (33 and 40 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: CZM

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a floatie that is not a vest for my 7yr son who is 61 lbs. I came across this one and decided to give it a try for his birthday pool party, and I am so glad I did because not only did it fit but has extra length to grow into. I also love the concept that you can remove arm or chest float and use either or. It helps the child build more confidence in learning how to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Viví

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver. I love that it works for a higher weight limit than any other brand we found in this style. My daughter loves it, and it holds her upright wonderfully. I am so grateful I found this product, as it was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: H.Howard

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this swim floaty for my niece who is 9 and doesn’t know how to swim. She is 62lb and it held her up and let her be in the water with ease. She loved that she can use together or apart. Can’t wait to take it and her to the bigger pool this weekend. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for my 8 year old with special needs
customer_reviews.text: All the other floaters were to small, not many options for special needs kiddos aside from a traditional life jacket. This was ideal for our little guy.
customer_reviews.author: NelsonTribe

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for our young swimmers!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put on my grandson and he truly enjoys the pool with the guidance of an adult. I’m very happy with this life jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for bigger kids
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after my grandson outgrew a similar item. He is 57 lbs and this fits him perfectly, and it is more buoyant than the arm floaties we tried.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: It works well..
customer_reviews.text: My son is 63 pounds which is out of range for puddle jumpers. He is not swimming just yet but working on it. This floatation device works great for him! He calls it his "armor". Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Unable to inflate the hand floats
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is really good, but I was unable to inflate the hand floats. Not sure if it requires a pump to inflate, but I returned the item after I was unable to use it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids jumped right in the pool with these! Gave them great confidence. I love that they don’t have to wear both if they don’t want. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie E.

customer_reviews.title: Great swim aid
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my 5 yr old. I like the arms unclip if needed. You can use with or without. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost 5 yr. old granddaughter, we love the way in works on her in the pool. She doesn't mind wearing it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Great for our child just to the 50 pound mark and the puddle jumper wasn’t enough. This goes to 66 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Worked o.k.
customer_reviews.text: The vest was cumbersome and wouldn't stay in place. We finally disconnected the vest and used the arm floaties on their own which was o.k. The free unicorn cup holder you sent was split open upon receipt so had to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Bodman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 2 in 1 product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 6 year old; he’s in the middle of swim lessons, but cannot yet swim alone. I picked this product because it gave the chest floatie AND arm floats... but what intrigued me to this product is the arm floats can detach from the chest one- what an awesome idea to give parents & kids 2 options! It also came with a drawstring bag to hole all of the floatie!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this floatie! My son is almost 4. And being hes a chunky one, the puddle jumper no longer fit him. When I came across this one, I just had to buy it and I'm glad I did. It fits him perfect! No discomfort or anything! Would definitely buy again and reccomend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Jeansonne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these while swimming and it makes him feel so confident that he will not drown.
customer_reviews.author: acovi006

customer_reviews.title: but it seems to be very good quality, and it comes with a nice mesh ...
customer_reviews.text: The floatie and arm bands fits my 5 year old, 45 pound 44 inch tall son well. We haven’t had a chance to try it in the water yet, but it seems to be very good quality, and it comes with a nice mesh carrying bag. I’m pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Child is 5 and complains about it not fitting around her and feeling comfortable
customer_reviews.author: felicia vargeson

customer_reviews.title: Fits my little swimmer perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I thought it would be too big for my 19-month-old water baby, but it fit perfectly! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarita Smile

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable, chest vest rotates to the side does not stay in place
customer_reviews.author: KatieGirl529

customer_reviews.title: Great floaty!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my almost 4 year old, and we used it for the first time this weekend. She loved it. It seemed to be comfortable and kept her afloat! Definitely recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley White

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Been used in a daily basis for a couple months with no issues - great quality
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works Great for my 7 year old son, also it’s comfortable to him so that’s a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: 🌞Stacy🌞

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this floatie for my 6 year old son/50lb son. He loved it and so did I. It was easy to put on and he stayed in it ALL day at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: We've only used this floatie once, but it was much more comfortable than the cheap plastic ones. We also liked that we can customize the amount of support so she can swim more on her own and then have more support when she gets tired.
customer_reviews.author: woolfwomyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit my granddaughter very comfortably and did the job
customer_reviews.author: Michael Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Comfy for my 6 year old and still with room for growth.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rapagnani

customer_reviews.title: Good size for a 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: We've used these a few times now and my daughter really likes them. Good fit for a five year old. The arms can be a little tight at times, but adjusting the inflation helps with that.
customer_reviews.author: l smith

customer_reviews.title: The best floaties!!
customer_reviews.text: The best Floaties we have ever gotten. Fits perfect and so comfortable on my little girl. We have gone through so many different ones And we finally found the right pair!!
customer_reviews.author: V.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: It fits my 5 year old well. He prefers this to his vest. I think he feels more secure. It’s great for travel because it’s inflatable.
customer_reviews.author: Sara L.

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i expected
customer_reviews.text: well made product , and it feels durable . i have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I think it is very helpful. I enjoyed the carry bag that came with it. It actually ended up being my pool toy and floaties bag. Only downside is that it is slightly too big my little guys arms at 14 months. The belt fit very nicely though. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dynowizjr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 55 pounder!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my big 4 year old! He’s 55lbs and tall and I couldn’t find anything that would make him feel safe. Then I found this. It’s fits great and really makes him feel safe in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Martha Klotz

customer_reviews.title: This floatie set seems to be well made. I've ...
customer_reviews.text: This floatie set seems to be well made. I've only used it once so far, but my four year old son stayed a float with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: CMADRAGON

customer_reviews.title: fits great on 6 year old of 60 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: My boy still getting there with swimming, and he out grew his puddle jumper. This fits him perfectly with room to grow until he feels comfortable swimming on his own. Definitely recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for our 5 year old grandson when we take him on a vacation. It will be great for traveling and easy to pack. I also like the fact that it comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: JMI

customer_reviews.title: Straps too long
customer_reviews.text: My son floated just fine with these, but it hung around his lower belly, and the straps from the arm floaties, were too long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is great to find a floatie like this style that has ...
customer_reviews.text: It is great to find a floatie like this style that has a higher weight limit most only go to 50 lbs! sizing is a little big for my bigger than average 3 year old, unfortunately. Used it for the first time this week and my daughter LOVED it. Also, as a mom I was confident that my daughter was safe!
customer_reviews.author: Shyla Kuehl

customer_reviews.title: Great first time floatie!
customer_reviews.text: I love this floatie and my 2 year old was fearless with this on! It is great how the better she gets at swimming, I have the ability to change it into just arm floaties!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've gotten
customer_reviews.text: The floatie works great! Definitely recommend it! My daughter is almost brave enough to swim without but she liked being able to have the whole thing on or just the arms. The fabric lining is a must. Way better than the plastic ones I grew up with :)
customer_reviews.author: L. E.

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. My son is going to be 2 yrs and a half and he loves that i dont have to hold him all the time and im just near him.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Great for big kids.
customer_reviews.text: It's great for larger kids. I got it for my son who is 2 but had out grown the normal jumpers. It works great and it's comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Markesbery

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality floaties and vest. It’s a little big for my daughter but she’ll grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Safety for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this floating. Gives her a secure feeling as she’s learning to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Lois M. Perrupato

customer_reviews.title: Just and aid as described..not a life jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is an aid for swimming. Not exactly a puddle jumper so be aware. I recommend for kids 5 and up that are strong at kicking and paddling.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We haven't tried it yet but it looks great...so excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Leff

customer_reviews.title: Size is not as indicated
customer_reviews.text: Size was not as indicated. Child is 9 months old, the smallest size (which we ordered), was too big and bulky, he couldn’t even move, looked very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: Crappy workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great first couple times then noticed we had to keep blowing up the one arm band was hoping it would last at least on season Won’t buy again. Found out inside-seam pulled apart no worth the money we paid for it
customer_reviews.author: lu17020

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase experience.
customer_reviews.text: The purchase went great. Can't give a detailed review yet as it's for my grandson, who will arrive from Germany in a few days. Hopefully, it will be perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: ... my niece who is learning to swim and she loved it! She seemed very comfortable in the water ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece who is learning to swim and she loved it! She seemed very comfortable in the water wearing the floatie and vest. It's hard to tell in the product pictures but the interior is lined with soft quality fabric which certainly beats the plastic or styrofoam floaties that I grew up with. I'm also impressed with how compact the floatie folds up. It fits nicely into a mini kid-sized backpack (see pictures.)
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The floaties have a gap they don't stay on well and put a rash on both kids
customer_reviews.author: jennifer kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: With this life jacket, my daughter finally loves to swim. It's easy to put on and take off and helps a lot for kids float on the water. Light enough to bring when you travel. It seems it make my daughter feels more familiar with water and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My kids outgrew the ones limited to 50 lbs and these work great. Wish I knew about these before I bought the other ones as these work for a wider size range.
customer_reviews.author: SergS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The Doji Kids First Floatie Swim Vest Life Jacket, fit perfectly on my grand daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: viramonp

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, looks durable, shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my grandson who will visit next month. He loves the pool.
customer_reviews.author: B. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Bringing them to Maui
customer_reviews.text: We havent used them yet. Traveling to Maui to use with our 1 year old grand daughter. We will let you know when we get back!! PS delivery was 10 out of 10. They look like they will travel well
customer_reviews.author: brenda cucukov

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: Looks like this will be perfect for us. We'll use it in about a month but we've blown it up and tried it on our 6-year old and I think this will be a good transition from the puddle jumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for children who have outgrown puddle jumpers!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is over 60 lbs and no longer fit in her puddle jumper. She needed something more supportive than arm floties since she is not a strong swimmer. This product was perfect for her!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for a 24lb toddler.
customer_reviews.text: It was too big and bulky for our 24lb toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it yet but looks well made, and way more compact than similar floats.
customer_reviews.author: JayLea Utera

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Fits my granddaughter good she likes it way better than the life jacket she wore last year
customer_reviews.author: AngelKSmith

customer_reviews.title: Gave my son confidence
customer_reviews.text: This floatie works great for our son. It fits him well, and gives him more confidence to walk around in our pool. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allyx

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product...my son is a bit scared of the water but felt much safer with this floatie. Easy to travel with. He’s not ready to take the arm floaties off but once he does I like how they detach and he’ll still have the body floatie. The only negative was we had a bit of trouble inflating one side of the arm floatie.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the freedom to swim without the hassle of a jacket riding up and rubbing my kids arms raw
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That they kept him above water
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product it help my godson with trusting the water. And now I am able to teach him how to swim. So glad I purchase this product and gave it a chance. Also like that the arms detached
customer_reviews.author: Edward  Greene

customer_reviews.title: Looks great - will be used on vacation soon
customer_reviews.text: We don’t have used it yet - we ordered it for vacation. The materials looks great and it seems to be easy to blow up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect fit for my daughter! Most of the floaties are made too small. She was swimming comfortably with it on and gaining more confidence in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked great with my 5 year who is learning to swim
customer_reviews.text: worked great with my 5 year who is learning to swim. He felt save and swam all day on our summer vacation.
customer_reviews.author: DRamirez

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at the waterpark
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who is just over 50 lbs. There isnt much options for over 50 lbs but we tried It this weekend and it worked very well for her and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Fits my perfectly and great for travel bc of its compact size.
customer_reviews.author: LORI

customer_reviews.title: Positive, the weight limit is higher then similar products ...
customer_reviews.text: Positive, the weight limit is higher then similar products and the arm are inflatable so you can pack easier. Negative, chest piece doesn’t sit high enough on child.
customer_reviews.author: David Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it but it was just too big for my 23 lb granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Green

customer_reviews.title: Doji First Floatie.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for the pool and teaching my granddaughter how to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big!
customer_reviews.text: This is for older children. my 3 year old slipped right out of them and never wanted to wear again.
customer_reviews.author: Kennon Poynter

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter just turned five and this floatie is great because it is not too tight on her arms
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter just turned five and this floatie is great because it is not too tight on her arms. No red marks and easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality - will work well. We like that is can be separate pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Bought a pair for my 4 year old twins. Really like how you can use the arm floats by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McClendon

customer_reviews.title: Great and soft!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and is nice and soft on the skin!
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Smart idea
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice that the arm floats can be detached or attached. A much better option than previous floats I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P

product_meta.title: Doji Kids First Floatie Swim Vest Life Jacket with Detachable Soft Fabric Arm Floaties and Travel Bag
feature_bullets: ✔ WEAR TWO WAYS – Our patent pending design lets the First Floatie Swim Vest grow with your child and his/her swimming abilities. Use the swim belt with the arm bands for added flotation or detach each arm band for individual use!
✔ ULTRA COMFORTABLE, HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS – Composed of woven polyester and soft nylon (not plastic!) fabrics to increase comfort and reduce chafing

✔ THOUGHTFULLY DESIGNED FOR SAFETY AND FUNCTION – Recommended for ages 3-5 (or 24-66 lbs), ASTM tested for toy safety and Prop65 compliant, the First Floatie features bright colors for increased visibility and quick-release buckles, with a comfortable fit to promote confidence in the water
✔ SPACE EFFICIENT DESIGN IS IDEAL FOR TRAVEL – Efficient flat-pack design makes packing and traveling with the First Floatie Swim Vest easier than ever
✔ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – Each purchase is backed by Doji Kids’ 100% Satisfaction Guarantee and limited warranty. If you are not happy, contact our customer support team!
